biotools.summary:
DataDiscovery aims at providing researchers a simple and fast access to relevant biological data using specific keywords and easy to use filters.

This tool is expected to be easily customizable for specific filters, environments, or data schemas. Its current implementations supported by URGI are: WheatIS, Plant, RARe.

bioschemas.name: DataDiscovery
